key_risks: Legal and financial risks due to ongoing investigations into Q2 2023 earnings report
Supply chain vulnerabilities including semiconductor shortages and reliance on rare earth metals
Customer concentration risk with significant revenue dependency on key customers like Apple, Samsung, and Sonova
controversies: Investigation by The Gross Law Firm regarding Q2 2023 earnings report
Supply chain disputes related to COVID-19 contractual obligations and force majeure clauses
environmental_issues: Reliance on raw materials like rare earth metals, which may have environmental extraction impacts
social_issues: Need to maintain ethical labor standards and compliance with anti-corruption laws across diverse legal environments
governance_issues: Complex international trade regulations and compliance with environmental standards and data privacy laws
